channel.title: NEED help for path on vista :(
channel.description: hi, i need help using the java path on vista, idk why its not working jus ses path no specified when i click run on my 508 server, i think the path is diff for vista im not to sure anyways HELP :) plz

item.title: NEED help for path on vista :(
item.dc:creator: @ice_tea_fir3 ice tea fir3
item.description:
@ice_tea_fir3 wrote:

look its lyk thi though

classpath : .;C:\Program Files\Java\jre1.6.0_12\lib\ext\QTJava.zip

path: %SystemRoot%\system32;%SystemRoot%;%SystemRoot%\System32\Wbem;C:\Acer\Empowering Technology\eDataSecurity;C:\Acer\Empowering Technology\eDataSecurity\x86;C:\Acer\Empowering Technology\eDataSecurity\x64;C:\Program Files\CA\PPRT\bin;C:\Program Files\QuickTime\QTSystem\

item.source: NEED help for path on vista :(

item.title: NEED help for path on vista :(
item.dc:creator: @Fat_Cookies Fat Cookies
item.description:
@Fat_Cookies wrote:

JRE = Java Runtime Enviroment
JDK = Java Development Kit.

Your classpath should be your JRE path while your Path varibale is the jdk path.

Read full topic

item.title: NEED help for path on vista :(
item.dc:creator: @Fat_Cookies Fat Cookies
item.description:
@Fat_Cookies wrote:

ice tea fir3:

i think the path is diff for vista

Just no.
Its:

C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_XX

XX being the update version of JDK 6, which you should know because you downloaded it.

Read full topic
